EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to Inspiration for Boston Pizza Store {!BP_Store_Invite__c.BP_Store_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
One of Live Different's school presentation teams is going to be in your area on {!BP_Store_Invite__c.Date__c}, bringing a motivational presentation to {!Account.Name}, and we'd love for you to join us! The presentation is a 1-hour mix of live music, personal stories, funny videos, crowd interactions and more, all designed to empower your community's youth with a sense of value, purpose, and responsibility.
{!BP_Store_Invite__c.Presentation_Time_Formula__c} on {!BP_Store_Invite__c.Date__c} and the school's address is: {!Account.Name} {!Account.BillingAddress}
It's always a great time, so why not come check out how your efforts are impacting the lives of young people in your area and across the country?
To RSVP, or ask any questions, please email us at dave@livedifferent.com and we'll be happy to help!
Thanks again for all your support. Hopefully we'll see you soon!
Dave Hamilton Manager of School Partnerships Live Different
